title: Evaluating Large Language Models for Quality Control in Research Ethics Review
details: P Maghsoudlou, J Fennely-Barnwell, A Abraham… - 2025
abstract: Abstract Large Language Models (LLMs) could streamline research ethics and governance review by automating routine quality control checks. This study assessed Claude 3.5 Sonnet, ChatGPT4o, and Microsoft CoPilot in evaluating …

title: Data-GAN Augmentation Techniques in Medical Image Analysis: A Deep Survey
details: A Dash, T Swarnkar - SN Computer Science, 2025
abstract: Abstract Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) have emerged as a powerful tool for data augmentation in medical imaging, enabling the generation of realistic synthetic images to augment small and heterogeneous training datasets. This work …
